title: Apollo Theater gets new marquee
content:
[You need to register for this article in the NY Times](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907154330/http:/www.nytimes.com/2005/12/15/arts/15apol.html)  
But you can catch a peek at the new Marquee typeface we designed for this project.

 [‹ Period, space space capital letter](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907154330/http:/www.typophile.com/node/9147 "Go to previous forum topic") [Double-spacing after periods ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907154330/http:/www.typophile.com/node/3466 "Go to next forum topic")
author: terminaldesign

comments.content: Very cool, James! I will have to make the trek up to see it in person.
There are using video screens rather than posters, it should be rather dramatic.
